ComicInfo.Summary:
It's Christmas! And nothing says "Happy Holidays" like ----a vampire Santa Claus? Chastity returns home to New York City, but her most likely lonely holiday is interrupted by the evil machinations of a child-collecting Saint Nick! Can Chas overcome the flood of melancholy memories of family holidays past before "Santa Claws" adds more victims to his horrifying collection? He knows if you've been bad...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B/Sub | Subscription Cover | Tim Seeley & Vinicius Andrade | 2 | C/RI | Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 3 | D/RI | Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Tim Seeley | 4 | E/LE | Ultra-Rare Limited Edition "Virgin" Cover, Limited to 25 | Emanuela Lupacchino | 5 | F/LE | Ultra-Rare Limited Edition "Virgin" Cover, Limited to 25 | Tim Seeley | 6 |
